verses.verse: ה֣וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Woe רֹעִ֗ים <S%H7462><s%> be unto the pastors מְאַבְּדִ֧ים <S%H6><s%> that destroy וּמְפִצִ֛ים <S%H6327><s%> and scatter אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֹ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> the sheep מַרְעִיתִ֖י <S%H4830><s%> of my pasture נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

לָ֠כֵן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning הָרֹעִים֮ <S%H7462><s%> against the pastors הָרֹעִ֣ים <S%H7462><s%> that feed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּי֒ <S%H5971><s%> my people אַתֶּ֞ם <S%H859><s%> You הֲפִצֹתֶ֤ם <S%H6327><s%> Ye have scattered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צֹאנִי֙ <S%H6629><s%> my flock וַתַּדִּח֔וּם <S%H5080><s%> and driven them away וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not פְקַדְתֶּ֖ם <S%H6485><s%> and have not visited אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> I am about פֹקֵ֧ד <S%H6485><s%> them behold I will visit עֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> concerning אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֹ֥עַ <S%H7455><s%> upon you the evil מַעַלְלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H4611><s%> of your doings נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וַאֲנִ֗י <S%H589><s%> Myself אֲקַבֵּץ֙ <S%H6908><s%> And I will gather אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> the remnant צֹאנִ֔י <S%H6629><s%> of my flock מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָאֲרָצ֔וֹת <S%H776><s%> out of all countries אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> I הִדַּ֥חְתִּי <S%H5080><s%> whither I have driven אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> them וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֥י <S%H7725><s%> them and will bring them again אֶתְהֶ֛ן <S%H853><s%> עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto נְוֵהֶ֖ן <S%H5116><s%> to their folds וּפָר֥וּ <S%H6509><s%> and they shall be fruitful וְרָבֽוּ׃ <S%H7235><s%> and increase

וַהֲקִמֹתִ֧י <S%H6965><s%> And I will set up עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> over רֹעִ֖ים <S%H7462><s%> shepherds וְרָע֑וּם <S%H7462><s%> over them which shall feed וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יִֽירְא֨וּ <S%H3372><s%> them and they shall fear ע֧וֹד <S%H5750><s%> any וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יֵחַ֛תּוּ <S%H2865><s%> no more nor be dismayed וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִפָּקֵ֖דוּ <S%H6485><s%> neither shall they be lacking נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold יָמִ֤ים <S%H3117><s%> Behold the days בָּאִים֙ <S%H935><s%> come נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַהֲקִמֹתִ֥י <S%H6965><s%> that I will raise לְדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> unto David צֶ֣מַח <S%H6780><s%> Branch צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> a righteous וּמָ֤לַךְ <S%H4427><s%> shall reign מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> and a King וְהִשְׂכִּ֔יל <S%H7919><s%> and prosper וְעָשָׂ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> and shall execute מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment וּצְדָקָ֖ה <S%H6666><s%> and justice בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the earth

בְּיָמָיו֙ <S%H3117><s%> In his days תִּוָּשַׁ֣ע <S%H3467><s%> shall be saved יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> and Israel יִשְׁכֹּ֣ן <S%H7931><s%> shall dwell לָבֶ֑טַח <S%H983><s%> safely וְזֶה־ <S%H2088><s%> and this שְּׁמ֥וֹ <S%H8034><s%> and this [is] his name אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִקְרְא֖וֹ <S%H7121><s%> whereby he shall be called יְהוָ֥ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צִדְקֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H6664><s%> prosperity ס

לָכֵ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore הִנֵּֽה־ <S%H2009><s%> behold יָמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> Therefore behold the days בָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> come נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will no יֹ֤אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> that they shall no more say עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> longer חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> who הֶעֱלָ֛ה <S%H5927><s%> which brought up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> But The LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who הֶעֱלָה֩ <S%H5927><s%> which brought up וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who הֵבִ֜יא <S%H935><s%> and which led אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זֶ֨רַע <S%H2233><s%> the seed בֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> country צָפ֔וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> out of the north וּמִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all הָֽאֲרָצ֔וֹת <S%H776><s%> and from all countries אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who הִדַּחְתִּ֖ים <S%H5080><s%> whither I had driven שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> they וְיָשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> them and they shall dwell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on אַדְמָתָֽם׃ <S%H127><s%> in their own land ס

לַנְּבִאִ֞ים <S%H5030><s%> because of the prophets נִשְׁבַּ֧ר <S%H7665><s%> me is broken לִבִּ֣י <S%H3820><s%> Mine heart בְקִרְבִּ֗י <S%H7130><s%> within רָֽחֲפוּ֙ <S%H7363><s%> shake כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All עַצְמוֹתַ֔י <S%H6106><s%> all my bones הָיִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> have become כְּאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man שִׁכּ֔וֹר <S%H7910><s%> I am like a drunken וּכְגֶ֖בֶר <S%H1397><s%> and like a man עֲבָ֣רוֹ <S%H5674><s%> hath overcome יָ֑יִן <S%H3196><s%> whom wine מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> because יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּמִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> accept דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> and because of the words קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6944><s%> of his holiness

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for מְנָֽאֲפִים֙ <S%H5003><s%> of adulterers מָלְאָ֣ה <S%H4390><s%> is full הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> For the land כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מִפְּנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> for because אָלָה֙ <S%H423><s%> of swearing אָבְלָ֣ה <S%H56><s%> mourneth הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land יָבְשׁ֖וּ <S%H3001><s%> are dried up נְא֣וֹת <S%H4999><s%> the pleasant places מִדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> of the wilderness וַתְּהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become מְרֽוּצָתָם֙ <S%H4794><s%> and their course רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> is evil וּגְבוּרָתָ֖ם <S%H1369><s%> and their force לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not כֵֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> after that כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> again

נָבִ֥יא <S%H5030><s%> For both prophet גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> both כֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> and priest חָנֵ֑פוּ <S%H2610><s%> are profane גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> Even בְּבֵיתִ֛י <S%H1004><s%> yea in my house מָצָ֥אתִי <S%H4672><s%> have I found רָעָתָ֖ם <S%H7451><s%> their wickedness נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

לָכֵן֩ <S%H3651><s%> Therefore יִֽהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become דַרְכָּ֜ם <S%H1870><s%> Wherefore their way לָהֶ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> will be like כַּחֲלַקְלַקּוֹת֙ <S%H2519><s%> shall be unto them as slippery בָּֽאֲפֵלָ֔ה <S%H653><s%> [ways] in the darkness יִדַּ֖חוּ <S%H1760><s%> they shall be driven on וְנָ֣פְלוּ <S%H5307><s%> and fall בָ֑הּ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אָבִ֨יא <S%H935><s%> therein for I will bring עֲלֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H5921><s%> and רָעָ֛ה <S%H7451><s%> evil שְׁנַ֥ת <S%H8141><s%> upon them [even] the year פְּקֻדָּתָ֖ם <S%H6486><s%> of their visitation נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> God

וּבִנְבִיאֵ֥י <S%H5030><s%> in the prophets שֹׁמְר֖וֹן <S%H8111><s%> of Samaria רָאִ֣יתִי <S%H7200><s%> And I have seen תִפְלָ֑ה <S%H8604><s%> folly הִנַּבְּא֣וּ <S%H5012><s%> they prophesied בַבַּ֔עַל <S%H1168><s%> in Baal וַיַּתְע֥וּ <S%H8582><s%> to err אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> and caused my people אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel ס

וּבִנְבִאֵ֨י <S%H5030><s%> also in the prophets יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem רָאִ֣יתִי <S%H7200><s%> I have seen שַׁעֲרוּרָ֗ה <S%H8186><s%> an horrible thing נָא֞וֹף <S%H5003><s%> they commit adultery וְהָלֹ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> and walk בַּשֶּׁ֙קֶר֙ <S%H8267><s%> in lies וְחִזְּקוּ֙ <S%H2388><s%> they strengthen יְדֵ֣י <S%H3027><s%> also the hands מְרֵעִ֔ים <S%H7489><s%> of evildoers לְבִ֨לְתִּי־ <S%H1115><s%> no שָׁ֔בוּ <S%H7725><s%> doth return אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> that none מֵרָֽעָת֑וֹ <S%H7451><s%> from his wickedness הָֽיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> have become לִ֤י כֻלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> All כִּסְדֹ֔ם <S%H5467><s%> they are all of them unto me as Sodom וְיֹשְׁבֶ֖יהָ <S%H3427><s%> and the inhabitants כַּעֲמֹרָֽה׃ <S%H6017><s%> thereof as Gomorrah ס

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֨ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> concerning הַנְּבִאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> concerning the prophets הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> I am going מַאֲכִ֤יל <S%H398><s%> Behold I will feed אוֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> לַֽעֲנָ֔ה <S%H3939><s%> them with wormwood וְהִשְׁקִתִ֖ים <S%H8248><s%> and make them drink מֵי־ <S%H4325><s%> the water רֹ֑אשׁ <S%H7219><s%> of gall כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> for מֵאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> נְבִיאֵ֣י <S%H5030><s%> for from the prophets יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem יָצְאָ֥ה <S%H3318><s%> gone forth חֲנֻפָּ֖ה <S%H2613><s%> is profaneness לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> into all the land פ

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֗וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּשְׁמְע֞וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hearken עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto דִּבְרֵ֤י <S%H1697><s%> not unto the words הַנְּבִאִים֙ <S%H5030><s%> of the prophets הַנִּבְּאִ֣ים <S%H5012><s%> that prophesy לָכֶ֔ם מַהְבִּלִ֥ים <S%H1891><s%> unto you they make you vain הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> חֲז֤וֹן <S%H2377><s%> a vision לִבָּם֙ <S%H3820><s%> of their own heart יְדַבֵּ֔רוּ <S%H1696><s%> they speak לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> from מִפִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> [and] not out of the mouth יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

אֹמְרִ֤ים <S%H559><s%> They say אָמוֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> still לִֽמְנַאֲצַ֔י <S%H5006><s%> unto them that despise דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> hath said יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> me The LORD שָׁל֖וֹם <S%H7965><s%> Ye shall have peace יִֽהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will have לָכֶ֑ם וְ֠כֹל <S%H3605><s%> who הֹלֵ֞ךְ <S%H1980><s%> unto every one that walketh בִּשְׁרִר֤וּת <S%H8307><s%> after the imagination לִבּוֹ֙ <S%H3820><s%> of his own heart אָֽמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> and they say לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not תָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> shall come עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and רָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> No evil

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> But מִ֤י <S%H4310><s%> who עָמַד֙ <S%H5975><s%> For who hath stood בְּס֣וֹד <S%H5475><s%> in the counsel יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְיֵ֖רֶא <S%H7200><s%> and hath perceived וְיִשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> and heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָר֑וֹ <S%H1697><s%> his word מִֽי־ <S%H4310><s%> who הִקְשִׁ֥יב <S%H7181><s%> has given [דְּבָרִי כ] (דְּבָרֹ֖ו <S%H1697><s%> to his word ק) וַיִּשְׁמָֽע׃ <S%H8085><s%> and heard ס

הִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <S%H2009><s%> Behold סַעֲרַ֣ת <S%H5591><s%> Behold a whirlwind יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD חֵמָה֙ <S%H2534><s%> in fury יָֽצְאָ֔ה <S%H3318><s%> is gone forth וְסַ֖עַר <S%H5591><s%> whirlwind מִתְחוֹלֵ֑ל <S%H2342><s%> even a grievous עַ֛ל <S%H5921><s%> on רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the head רְשָׁעִ֖ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked יָחֽוּל׃ <S%H2342><s%> it shall fall grievously

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> will not יָשׁוּב֙ <S%H7725><s%> shall not return אַף־ <S%H639><s%> The anger יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Until עֲשֹׂת֥וֹ <S%H6213><s%> until he have executed וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> Until הֲקִימ֖וֹ <S%H6965><s%> and till he have performed מְזִמּ֣וֹת <S%H4209><s%> the thoughts לִבּ֑וֹ <S%H3820><s%> of his heart בְּאַֽחֲרִית֙ <S%H319><s%> in the latter הַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> days תִּתְבּ֥וֹנְנוּ <S%H995><s%> ye shall consider בָ֖הּ בִּינָֽה׃ <S%H998><s%> it perfectly

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁלַ֥חְתִּי <S%H7971><s%> I have not sent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּבִאִ֖ים <S%H5030><s%> these prophets וְהֵ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> they רָ֑צוּ <S%H7323><s%> yet they ran לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not דִבַּ֥רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> I have not spoken אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> about וְהֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> they נִבָּֽאוּ׃ <S%H5012><s%> to them yet they prophesied

עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מָתַ֗י <S%H4970><s%> How הֲיֵ֛שׁ <S%H3426><s%> How long shall [this] be בְּלֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> in the heart הַנְּבִאִ֖ים <S%H5030><s%> of the prophets נִבְּאֵ֣י <S%H5012><s%> that prophesy הַשָּׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> falsehood וּנְבִיאֵ֖י <S%H5030><s%> even prophets תַּרְמִ֥ת <S%H8649><s%> of the deceit לִבָּֽם׃ <S%H3820><s%> of their own heart

הִ֠נְנִי <S%H2005><s%> behold עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> I am against נִבְּאֵ֞י <S%H5012><s%> Behold I [am] against them that prophesy חֲלֹמ֥וֹת <S%H2472><s%> dreams שֶׁ֙קֶר֙ <S%H8267><s%> FALSE נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַֽיְסַפְּרוּם֙ <S%H5608><s%> and do tell וַיַּתְע֣וּ <S%H8582><s%> to err אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַמִּ֔י <S%H5971><s%> them and cause my people בְּשִׁקְרֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H8267><s%> by their lies וּבְפַחֲזוּתָ֑ם <S%H6350><s%> and by their lightness וְאָנֹכִ֨י <S%H595><s%> them לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor שְׁלַחְתִּ֜ים <S%H7971><s%> yet I sent וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor צִוִּיתִ֗ים <S%H6680><s%> them not nor commanded וְהוֹעֵ֛יל <S%H3276><s%> them therefore they shall not profit לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor יוֹעִ֥ילוּ <S%H3276><s%> at all לָֽעָם־ <S%H5971><s%> this people הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> But מַשָּׂ֣א <S%H4853><s%> The burden יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD תֹּאמֵרוּ֒ <S%H559><s%> since ye say לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> therefore thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD יַ֧עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because אֲמָרְכֶ֛ם <S%H559><s%> Because ye say אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> this word הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> this מַשָּׂ֣א <S%H4853><s%> The burden יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וָאֶשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> and I have sent אֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> to you לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> unto you saying לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תֹאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> Ye shall not say מַשָּׂ֥א <S%H4853><s%> The burden יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

לָכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore הִנְנִ֔י <S%H2005><s%> behold וְנָשִׁ֥יתִי <S%H5382><s%> forget אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> נָשֹׁ֑א <S%H5377><s%> Therefore behold I even I will utterly וְנָטַשְׁתִּ֣י <S%H5203><s%> you and I will forsake אֶתְכֶ֗ם <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> you and the city אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֧תִּי <S%H5414><s%> that I gave לָכֶ֛ם וְלַאֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> you and your fathers מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> from פָּנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> [and cast you] out of my presence

וְנָתַתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> And I will bring עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and חֶרְפַּ֣ת <S%H2781><s%> reproach עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> an everlasting וּכְלִמּ֣וּת <S%H3640><s%> shame עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> upon you and a perpetual אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִשָּׁכֵֽחַ׃ <S%H7911><s%> which shall not be forgotten ס
